mapper.insert: insert into instructor ( img, word, name, file_id, category_id, price, level) values(#{img}, #{word}, #{name}, #{file_id}, #{category_id}, #{price}, #{level})
mapper.select: SELECT i.*, c.name AS categoryName FROM instructor i LEFT JOIN category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id WHERE i.instructor_id = #{instructor_id}
